filename: 01. Title Theme - The Legend of Zelda.mp3

title: Title Theme

filename: 02. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda.mp3
path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\02. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda.mp3
description: They added some beeps and bloops from the original game, it's not something I would select for a match. This came with the Hyrule Castle N64 DLC for the Wii U game.
title: Overworld Theme
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda

filename: 03. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda (64).mp3
path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\03. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda (64).mp3
description: I feel nostalgia for this but it's not all that exciting.
title: Overworld Theme
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda

filename: 04. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda (Melee).mp3
path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\04. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda (Melee).mp3
description: It's nice but yet another remix of the main theme. For the Great Bay stage they could have done the Termina theme instead!
title: Overworld Theme
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda

filename: 05. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda (Brawl).mp3
path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\05. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda (Brawl).mp3
description: This one is probably the best remix of this song. I like the live trumpet. And have a look at that, it's arranged by none other than Streets of Rage man himself, Yuzo Koshiro!!
title: Overworld Theme
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda

filename: 06. Overworld & Underworld - The Legend of Zelda (for 3DS & Wii U).mp3
path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\06. Overworld & Underworld - The Legend of Zelda (for 3DS & Wii U).mp3
description: This rivals Jungle Hijinx in terms of amount of remixes. This one really isn't bringing much to the table, although it has a really nice build up before it loops.
title: Overworld & Underworld
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\07. The Legend of Zelda Medley.mp3
description: For me this is a very questionable remix that they released when Hyrule Castle N64 was released as DLC. What's going on with that drum? When Zelda's Lullaby hits there are some flamenco vibes but I don't think it sounds good.
title: The Legend of Zelda Medley
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda / The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\08. Death Mountain.mp3
description: Super intense and super epic of this music from the original Zelda. The incorporation of the ending theme in an almost creepy way is great. The intensity just keeps ramping up! And of course the main theme comes in at the end too.
title: Death Mountain
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\09. Temple Theme.mp3
description: An all-time classic! Who doesn't know this iconic music? It's so dramatic and fantastical and the perfect remix from hands down the best music from Zelda II.
title: Temple Theme
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: Zelda II - The Adventure of Link

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\10. Great Temple & Temple.mp3
description: Shogo Sakai the legend decided to follow up his all-time classic Temple remix with another one, this time incorporating the second-best track from Zelda II, the great temple theme. It's great. It's a fun variation on the original.
title: Great Temple / Temple
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: Zelda II - The Adventure of Link

filename: 11. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda - A Link to the Past.mp3
path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\11. Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda - A Link to the Past.mp3
description: Another original classic theme for the Hyrule Castle N64 stage on the Wii U. It's good but I've never picked it for a match.
title: Overworld Theme - The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\12. Dark World (Brawl).mp3
description: An all-time classic from Brawl. For me this remix represented a shift in style - they were unafraid to remake this iconic in new and interesting ways. This track of course appeared in the Subspace Emissary which gives it instant classic status. I mean, with those guitars and accordions it is such a vibe.
title: Dark World
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\13. Dark World (for 3DS & Wii U).mp3
description: This remix WISHES it could be the Brawl remix but it doesn't even come close. It has the Dark World Dungeon theme in there as a bonus but it's not enough. It's just so generic.
title: Dark World
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\14. Hidden Mountain & Forest.mp3
description: A genuinely great track, which really throws me back to Link and Yoshi going through the forest stage together in Subspace Emissary. For many years I didn't know or understand what this music was, but I was a fool. The obscure tracks from ALTTP are great.
title: Hidden Mountain & Forest
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\15. Tal Tal Heights.mp3
description: Now here's a scandal for you, this remix isn't even of Tal Tal Heights, it's of the overworld theme! Can you believe it. There is a little hint of the Tal Tal Heights music before it loops, but the arranger definitely had a moment when writing down the name of the track he was remixing. That being said, it took me years before I noticed.
title: Tal Tal Heights
composers: Yuichi Ozaki, Kazumi Totaka, Minako Hamano, Kazue Ishikawa
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\16. Ocarina of Time Medley.mp3
description: I never liked this one. It's a nice idea to have all the main ocarina songs in there but I think it just sounds a bit dumb.
title: Ocarina of Time Medley
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\17. Hyrule Field Theme.mp3
description: I think this remix sounds like shit with shitty instruments. Thankfully in Ultimate you can also listen to the original too.
title: Hyrule Field Theme
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\18. Hyrule Field Theme.mp3
description: So great to have the original in here over that shitty remix from Brawl. This version also has all the variations. It's unafraid to take you to some weird places.
title: Hyrule Field Theme
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\19. Saria's Theme.mp3
description: A secret remix from melee times! This was a bonus to mix things up and I loooooooved it as a kid whenever it came on. It's very faithful to the original and that's fine.
title: Saria's Theme
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\20. Saria's Song & Middle Boss Battle.mp3
description: A strange choice of songs to make a medley out of. Miss me with the Saria's Song honestly but I love the boss music. It's so good on the original soundtrack and sounds great in this remix. Just what is it doing attached to this first half like this, I don't get it.
title: Saria's Song / Middle Boss Battle
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\21. Song of Storms.mp3
description: Very ambitious remix of this song! I like it. It takes you on a real journey. It even throws in Ganon's theme and just when you think it's done, the Serenade of Water for no reason whatsoever. Why the fuck not.
title: Song of Storms
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\22. Gerudo Valley.mp3
description: For me one of the stand-outs from the magical 3DS era. They meant BUSINESS with this new game. They took this timeless classic and they fucking rocked it. What a banger remix.
title: Gerudo Valley
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\23. Gerudo Valley.mp3
description: Why not have the original here as well as that banger remix? Both are great.
title: Gerudo Valley
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\24. Termina Field.mp3
description: So nice to get a Majora's Mask remix like 20 years later. It's alright! Finally something appropriate for the Great Bay stage.
title: Termina Field
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\25. Termina Field.mp3
description: Nice that they included the original of this song in Brawl, although it's a bit bittersweet because they replaced Young Link with Toon Link and otherwise have no Majora's Mask reference anywhere.
title: Termina Field
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\26. The Great Sea & Menu Select.mp3
description: I always thought this remix was pretty mid. I remember them using the Fairy Fountain music from this medley when they revealed Smash 4 Zelda and that will always mean it at least has some meaning for me.
title: The Great Sea / Menu Select
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\27. The Great Sea.mp3
description: They added the original for this track in Brawl before they controversially replaced it entirely with a remix in Smash 4. Personally I think this is better.
title: The Great Sea
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\28. Dragon Roost Island.mp3
description: It's a timeless classic, what can I say? I can imagine another world where somebody made a sick remix to this in Brawl, a la Dark World for example. So tragic that even with Ultimate, that never happened.
title: Dragon Roost Island
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\29. Molgera.mp3
description: I fucking love this remix, it's like top 5 for me. It's so intense!! Those amazing harmonies done by the horns and strings, insane. When the tune loops round again, they reharmonise it and it gets even more intense. I often pick this one in tournament to get that power up I need.
title: Molgera
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\30. Molgera.mp3
description: The original Molgera is very special because of the 'chaka chaka chaka' which the new remix admittedly doesn't feature. I'm still very happy to just have the remix because it's that good, but this original track is still a 5/5 in my books.
title: Molgera
composers: Hajime Wakai, Toru Minegishi, Koji Kondo
contributors: Hajime Wakai, Toru Minegishi, Koji Kondo
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker

description: To this day I haven't played this game so I haven't truly experienced it. But it's just Karaoke Village a little sped up. It's alright.
title: Village of the Blue Maiden
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda

description: They made it epic! I personally feel like this takes the magic away from the song a bit. It almost sounds a bit generic. But actually there's this really nice bit with the Fairy Fountain theme at the end.
title: Midna's Lament
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess

path: music/smash\Super Smash Bros. Anthology Vol. 05 - The Legend of Zelda (N64, Wii, 3DS, GC, Wii U, Switch) (gamerip) (1999)\34. Midna's Lament.mp3
description: The original, a gorgeous piano track which absolutely doesn't fit in a fighting game... except maybe it does. The characters are fighting to death though, listening to this.
title: Midna's Lament
album: Super Smash Bros. Anthology - Vol. 05: The Legend of Zelda
original-game: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
